name: TestOps Evolution Forge
observations: A multi-agent AI system for automated test generation.
Based on Cloud.ru Evolution Foundation Model.
Consists of a Python Backend and React Frontend.
Features: UI/API test generation, Self-correction loop, Batch processing, Streaming logs.

name: Backend
observations: Written in Python 3.11 using FastAPI and LangGraph.

name: Frontend
observations: Uses Tailwind CSS v4 for styling (Cloud.ru dark theme).
Uses Monaco Editor for code display.

name: Analyst Agent
observations: Responsible for parsing requirements and creating test plans.
Supports splitting tasks into scenarios for batch processing.

name: Coder Agent
observations: Uses Few-Shot Prompting to follow Page Object Model patterns.

name: Reviewer Agent
observations: Triggers a self-correction loop if errors are found.

name: Batch Processor
observations: Handles parallel execution of multiple test scenarios.

name: Evolution UI
observations: Custom dark theme matching Cloud.ru platform.

name: Security Strategy
observations: Performs Static Analysis (AST, Ruff) before execution.
Uses `pytest --collect-only` to validate code structure without running payload side-effects.

name: SSE Protocol
observations: Server-Sent Events used for streaming generation progress.
Allows real-time feedback loop visualization on Frontend.

name: Batch Architecture
observations: Hybrid Graph Pattern: Main StateGraph routes based on Analyst output.
Parallel Execution: Uses `asyncio.gather` with `Semaphore(5)` for rate limiting.

name: Frontend Architecture
observations: State Management: Zustand stores logs, code, and UI state.
Editor: Monaco Editor with custom 'cloud-ru-dark' theme matching brand colors.

name: Agentic Workflow
observations: Orchestrates Analyst, Coder, and Reviewer agents

name: White-Box Analysis
observations: Uses AST for Python/Java and Regex for JS

name: TestExecutorService
observations: Runs generated tests in isolated Docker containers
